name: Mosaique Neko Waifus 5
description:
Let's take a quick hike, shall we?

How could you say no? This is how your adventure with Kumi starts. Neko girls always give you this weird feeling of hiding a little secret.
But having unexpected encounters with Nekos always has a happy end, so why not just relax and let it all happen?



• Enjoy the unique puzzles
• Use special abilities that help you solve puzzles
• Also level them up, mix and match, and create your builds
• Navigate the different dialogue choices. Be nice!
• Collect items after each solved puzzle and boost your skills. 100 Items to collect in total
• View all the scenes unlocked in the gallery
• 20 Puzzles
• 100 Achievements
